Interface UgcSearch


  • public interface UgcSearch
    Interface for UGC search.

    • Method Detail

      • find

        @Deprecated
SearchResults<Node> find(java.lang.String scName,
                                     Session session,
                                     UgcFilter filter,
                                     int offset,
                                     int limit)
                              throws RepositoryException
        Deprecated. use find(String, ResourceResolver, UgcFilter, int, int, boolean)
        Perform a basic search.
        Parameters:
        scName - the name of the search collection.
        session - the user session.
        filter - the query filters.
        offset - the result offset.
        limit - the result limit.
        Returns:
        the search results as Nodes.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - thrown when there are issues with repository.

      • find

        SearchResults<Resource> find(java.lang.String scName,
                             ResourceResolver resolver,
                             UgcFilter filter,
                             int offset,
                             int limit,
                             boolean requiresTotal)
                      throws RepositoryException
        Perform a search with a component filter returning resources. Caution: When doing a search for resources managed by a SRP, you cannot use a parent/descendant constraint that is outside the SRP. This behavior will change in subsequent releases.
        Parameters:
        scName - the name of the search collection.
        resolver - the user session.
        filter - the query filters.
        offset - the result offset.
        limit - the result limit.
        requiresTotal - true iff the total number of matches needs to be returned in the search results
        Returns:
        the search results.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - thrown when there are issues with repository.

      • find

        SearchResults<Resource> find(java.lang.String scName,
                             ResourceResolver resolver,
                             UgcFilter filter,
                             int offset,
                             int limit,
                             boolean requiresTotal,
                             java.lang.String fieldLanguage)
                      throws RepositoryException
        Perform a search with a component filter returning resources. Caution: When doing a search for resources managed by a SRP, you cannot use a parent/descendant constraint that is outside the SRP. This behavior will change in subsequent releases.
        Parameters:
        scName - the name of the search collection.
        resolver - the user session.
        filter - the query filters.
        offset - the result offset.
        limit - the result limit.
        requiresTotal - true iff the total number of matches needs to be returned in the search results
        fieldLanguage - search will be queried against verbatim_fieldLanguage. This can be changed in the SOLR request handler.
        Returns:
        the search results.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - thrown when there are issues with repository.

      • getIndex

        int getIndex(java.lang.String scName,
             Session session,
             UgcFilter listing,
             java.lang.String targetPath,
             long added)
      throws RepositoryException
        Return the index of the target in the search result.
        Parameters:
        scName - the name of the search collection.
        session - the user session.
        listing - the query filters.
        targetPath - the path of the target.
        added - the date that the target was added.
        Returns:
        the index of the target in the search result.
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - thrown when there are issues with repository.
